item.title: Extending Hard Drive RedHat 7
item.description: Check current disk# fdisk -l Disk /dev/sda: 41.9 GB, 41943040000 bytes, 81920000 sectors Units = sectors of 1 * 512 = 512 bytes Sector size (logical/physical): 512 bytes / 512 bytes I/O size (minimum/optimal): 512 bytes / 512 bytes Disk label type: dos Disk identifier: 0x000d1957 Device Boot Start End Blocks Id System /dev/sda1 * 2048 1026047 512000 83 Linux /dev/sda2 1026048 81919999 40446976 8e Linux LVM Extend Virtual disk
